actions

Class FreeResourceAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.Action
      • actions.FreeResourceAction

  • public class FreeResourceAction
extends Action
    FreeResourceAction in a concrete action.

    It frees a resource from a ResourcefulUser to get it back in the resourcePool.

    Author:
    Marine Bal & Alexandre Moevi & Theo Plockyn

                  ResourcePool<?> resourcePool)
